text: A longtime aerialist for the famed Cirque Du Soleil plummeted to his death in front of a horrified crowd in Florida on Saturday night — while trying out a new act for the first time. Yann Arnaud, 38, was performing “ the aerial straps number ’ ’ for Cirque ’ s VOLTA show in Tampa when he apparently lost hold of his rope while swinging about 12 to 15 feet above the stage and fell, witnesses and the company said.
